title: I did it!
body:
https://i.gyazo.com/abbb7a54ce7c1dbd98ca76c2793f0a19.png
Grinding aram the whole day, finally got an S- and a chest.

replies.body: Time to get that Level 7 mastery to flash on Dark Star!

I remember when I had a chest up.
I probably got it within the hour.

Now key fragments on the other hand!
If you actually get enough of those babies to open your chests, then hot damn, you can call me impressed.
I usually get a lot of key fragments near the end of the month and the begin of next month.
name was misleading to the post, i had my hopes up
I get S almost every 5-10 games and i don't get chest... {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} Lucky you. :)
You can only get one chest per champion per season, which is about a year btw.

Good job. Chest on ARAM seems hard. I got one over the weekend as well after weeks of not getting any in any mode (I'm basically on champs I suck at now), got it on ARAM from Diana.

Luckily I got a better item from it than you did it seems.
